ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: You may have already discussed this I just joined and didn t read the archives, but is it true that on the race war server spells will be lootable?, if so
ygData.messageBody:
You may have already discussed this I just joined and didn't read
the archives, but is it true that on the race war server spells will be
lootable?, if so Could I persuade you folks to /feedback that to balance
this the contents of containers should be lootable as well, and/or that the
spell book should be a physical item (maybe given a special slot) but one
that can not be destroyed or dropped, and when you put it in the bank you
would not be able to use magic. This would fix some of the imbalances such
as non-magic classes being able to put their weapon/armor in a container if
it looks like they will lose a fight, and their ability to put everything in
the bank for a dangerous trip.
